text: Juncalinho is a townCabo Verde, Statistical Yearbook 2015, Instituto Nacional de Estatística, p. 32-33 in the eastern part of the island of São Nicolau, Cape Verde. It is situated on the north coast, 17 km east of Ribeira Brava. The local football club is FC Belo Horizonte. ==See also== *List of cities and towns in Cape Verde ==References== Category:Geography of São Nicolau, Cape Verde Category:Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde Category:Towns in Cape Verde
title: Juncalinho
